TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ApplicationSelectedHandler(object o, ApplicationSelectedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ApplicationSelectedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ApplicationSelectedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ApplicationSelectedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ApplicationSelectedHandler is removed from the event.
